scripts.start: npm run run-build && npm run serve
scripts.start-reloadsw: npm run run-build-reloadsw && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw: npm run run-build-sw && npm run serve
scripts.start-sw-reloadsw: npm run run-build-sw-reloadsw && npm run serve
scripts.build: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true astro build --experimental-integrations
scripts.run-build: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true astro build --experimental-integrations
scripts.run-build-reloadsw: rimraf dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true astro build --experimental-integrations
scripts.run-build-sw: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true astro build --experimental-integrations
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true astro build --experimental-integrations
